dmca.title: Video Copier Won't be Shouting "Yahooooo!!!"
dmca.body:
Dear Yahoo,
 
 
The following website is distributing for sale unauthorized copies of my companies videos.   Additionally, the content itself is in violation Yahoo acceptable use policies.
 
http://www.geocities.com/dud_2000_jp/
 
I, the undersigned, state UNDER PENALTY OF PERJURY that 
 
*  I am, the owner, or an agent authorized to act on behalf of the 
owner, of certain intellectual property rights ("IP Owner"); 
*  I have a good faith belief that the website: http://www.geocities.com/dud_2000_jp/
offers items  that are not authorized by
the IP Owner, its agent, or the law, and therefore infringe the IP 
Owner's rights; and 
*  The information in this notice is accurate. 
 
Please act expeditiously to remove the listings identified in the 
addendum.
 
I May Be Contacted At 
Name of IP Owner:* [Sender's Attorney]
Name and Title:* Owner  
Company: Enature
Address:* [Address]
City, State, and Zip:* San Luis Obispo, CA 93406
[e-mail address]
Telephone:* [telephone #]
Fax: [fax #]
 
 
The website, http://www.geocities.com/dud_2000_jp/, offers unauthorized copies of the IP Owner's copyrighted material.   The website also uses images and copyrighted text without authorization from the IP Owner.

 
Truthfully,
 
/S/: [Attorney]
